MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G33 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:35am. Our team have inspected the Orchard Park Standburn Road substation and have established an underground cable fault. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the work required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:02am on Thursday 4th March 2021
